## BufferLayout.swapBuffer() method

Swaps the buffer at the index to the argument, returning the stored buffer.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
swapBuffer(buffer: TBuffer, index: number): TBuffer;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  buffer | TBuffer |  |
|  index | number |  |

<b>Returns:</b>

TBuffer
